article_title: Kansas must show pragmatism in tackling Medicaid expansion
article_text:
Yes. Transgender students should get to use the restroom of their chosen gender.

No. Schools should instead offer an "all genders" restroom for transgender students, and allow for separate "boys" and "girls" rooms.

No. Students should use restrooms that correspond to their biology.

I don't know.

Vote

View Results

og.description: It’s been one irresponsible act after another in the Kansas Statehouse, with a heartless stand on health care among the worst.
